caption.p: Percent in vitro free radicals (DPPH and ABTS) scavenging and antidiabetic (α-amylase and α-glucosidase) activity of E. umbellata berries catechin. ( A) % DPPH scavenging activity, ( B) % ABTS scavenging activity, ( C) percent α-amylase inhibition potential, ( D) α-glucosidase inhibition potential of E. umbellata berries catechin at various concentrations.
